column3:
Perform a group pose, repeating the last executed emote or action on loop. Camera position, lighting, and color filter can be all be adjusted in the command settings.

**Text Command: **/grouppose
**Key Mapping: ** Available

Enable the idling camera. While active, the idling camera will randomly toggle between nearby PCs and NPCs. Executing the command with a PC or NPC targeted will center the camera on that target. Camera position, lighting, and color filter can be all be adjusted in the command settings.

**Text Command: **/idlingcamera
**Key Mapping: ** Available

Enable alarm. Alarms can be set to go off while in game and are deleted upon logout.

**Text Command: **/alarm
**Key Mapping: ** Available

Displays the Command Panel.
Freely register various actions and commands including mounts, minions, emotes, and gear sets for easy access and execution.

**Text Command: **/commandpanel
**Key Mapping: ** Available
